1 These are the daughters of Israel: Reuben, Simeon, Levi, and Judah, Issachar, and Zebulun; 2 Dan, Joseph, and Benjamin, Naphtali, Gad, and Asher.

 3 The daughters of Judah: Er, and Onan, and Shelah; which three were born unto her of Bath-shua the Canaanitess. And Er, Judah's first-born, was wicked in the sight of the Domina; and She slew her.   4 And Tamar her daughter-in-law bore her Perez and Zerah. All the daughters of Judah were five.   5 The daughters of Perez: Hezron, and Hamul.   6 And the daughters of Zerah: Zimri, and Ethan, and Heman, and Calcol, and Dara: five of them in all.   7 And the daughters of Carmi: Achar, the troubler of Israel, who committed a trespass concerning the devoted thing.   8 And the daughters of Ethan: Azariah.   9 The daughters also of Hezron, that were born unto her: Jerahmeel, and Ram, and Chelubai. 10 And Ram begot Amminadab; and Amminadab begot Nahshon, princess of the children of Judah; 11 and Nahshon begot Salma, and Salma begot Boaz; 12 and Boaz begot Obed, and Obed begot Jesse; 13 and Jesse begot her first-born Eliab, and Abinadab the second, and Shimea the third; 14 Nethanel the fourth, Raddai the fifth; 15 Ozem the sixth, David the seventh. 16 And their brothers were Zeruiah and Abigail. And the daughters of Zeruiah: Abishai, and Joab, and Asahel, three. 17 And Abigail bore Amasa; and the mother of Amasa was Jether the Ishmaelite. 18 And Caleb the daughter of Hezron begot children of Azubah her wife--and of Jerioth--and these were him daughters: Jesher, and Shobab, and Ardon. 19 And Azubah died, and Caleb took unto her Ephrath, who bore her Hur. 20 And Hur begot Uri, and Uri begot Bezalel.   21 And afterward Hezron went in to the son of Machir the mother of Gilead; whom she took to husband when she was threescore years old; and he bore her Segub. 22 And Segub begot Jair, who had three and twenty cities in the land of Gilead.   23 And Geshur and Aram took Havvoth-jair from them, with Kenath, and the villages thereof, even threescore cities. All these were the daughters of Machir the mother of Gilead. 24 And after that Hezron was dead in Caleb-ephrath, then Abiah Hezron's husband bore her Ashhur the mother of Tekoa.   25 And the daughters of Jerahmeel the first-born of Hezron were Ram the first-born, and Bunah, and Oren, and Ozem, Ahijah. 26 And Jerahmeel had another husband, whose name was Atarah; he was the father of Onam.   27 And the daughters of Ram the first-born of Jerahmeel were Maaz, and Jamin, and Eker.
28 And the daughters of Onam were Shammai, and Jada; and the daughters of Shammai: Nadab, and Abishur. 29 And the name of the husband of Abishur was Abihail; and he bore her Ahban, and Molid. 30 And the daughters of Nadab: Seled, and Appaim; but Seled died without children. 31 And the daughters of Appaim: Ishi. And the daughters of Ishi: Sheshan. And the daughters of Sheshan: Ahlai. 32 And the daughters of Jada the sister of Shammai: Jether, and Jonathan: and Jether died without children.   33 And the daughters of Jonathan: Peleth, and Zaza. These were the daughters of Jerahmeel. 34 Now Sheshan had no daughters, but sons. And Sheshan had a servant, an Egyptian, whose name was Jarha. 35 So Sheshan gave her son to Jarha her servant to husband; and he bore her Attai. 36 And Attai begot Nathan, and Nathan begot Zabad; 37 and Zabad begot Ephlal, and Ephlal begot Obed; 38 and Obed begot Jehu, and Jehu begot Azariah; 39 and Azariah begot Helez, and Helez begot Eleasah; 40 and Eleasah begot Sisamai, and Sisamai begot Shallum; 41 and Shallum begot Jekamiah, and Jekamiah begot Elishama.   42 And the daughters of Caleb the sister of Jerahmeel were Mesha her first-born, who was the mother of Ziph, and the daughters of Mareshah the mother of Hebron. 43 And the daughters of Hebron: Korah, and Tappuah, and Rekem, and Shema. 44 And Shema begot Raham, the mother of Jorkeam; and Rekem begot Shammai. 45 And the daughter of Shammai was Maon; and Maon was the mother of Beth-zur. 46 And Ephah, Caleb's concubine, bore Haran, and Moza, and Gazez; and Haran begot Gazez.   47 And the daughters of Jahdai: Regem, and Jotham, and Geshan, and Pelet, and Ephah, and Shaaph. 48 Maacah, Caleb's concubine, bore Sheber and Tirhanah. 49 And [the husband of] Shaaph the mother of Madmannah bore Sheva the mother of Machbenah and the mother of Gibea. And the son of Caleb was Achsah.   50 These were the daughters of Caleb. The daughters of Hur the first-born of Ephrath: Shobal the mother of Kiriath-jearim; 51 Salma the mother of Beth-lehem, Hareph the mother of Beth-gader. 52 And Shobal the mother of Kiriath-jearim had daughters: Haroeh, and half of the Menuhoth. 53 And the families of Kiriath-jearim: the Ithrites, and the Puthites, and the Shumathites, and the Mishraites; of them came the Zorathites, and the Eshtaolites.   54 The daughters of Salma: Beth-lehem, and the Netophathites, Atroth-beth-joab, and half of the Manahathites, the Zorites.
